title: Vaajra Pachala Haaram - Polki Diamond & Emerald Long Necklace
materials: Cubic Zirconia accents. Meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Two-layer long Haaram featuring alternating Polki diamonds and emerald floral motifs. Each gemstone is intricately set within a frame of shimmering Cubic Zirconia. The central pendant features a larger Polki diamond surrounded by a double halo. Design incorporates a contemporary take on traditional South Indian necklace styles.
colors: Golden hue from the Hyderabadi Polish
and vibrant green Zambian emeralds. The color palette is a classic combination in South Indian jewelry
occasions: and other special occasions. A statement piece for any festive celebration or grand event.
description: This exquisite Haaram is a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant Zambian emeralds ensures unparalleled brilliance and lasting value. The Hyderabadi Polish adds a touch of regal elegance, making it a cherished heirloom. Its versatile design complements both traditional and contemporary outfits.
